title: Digital Game-Based History Education Design: Simulation Learning for Patriotism Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: An innovative history pedagogy program for elementary school teachers, featuring hands-on education using VR/simulation tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Map the causes and effects of historical events to digital game scenarios for explanatory purposes
Apply the five stages (Analysis-Design-Development-Quality Assurance-Evaluation) of the DGBL-ID model to design educational games
Plan interactive learning experiences to foster patriotism among students using VR simulation tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
